dmca.title: Gawker's response to Coxe's complaint
dmca.body:
Dear [private],

I am in receipt of your letter dated March 31st 2006 regarding an image of Gary Coxe used on our website www.consumerist.com.

I have investigated the matter, and in light of your request I have asked our editor to remove the image of Mr Coxe from the site.

As for the content of the post, it is clearly not confidential information, it is information that is easily and publicly ascertainable. Any comments about the quality and nature of any of Mr Coxes
dmca.recipient_name: De Beaubien, Knight, Simmons, Mantzaris and Neal, LLP
